about_the_game:
In a land once flowing with milk and honey, resources suddenly began to run out. Sensing the impending end of the world as they knew it, the three heroes embark on a journey through unknown lands to uncover the mystery behind this life-sustaining energy crisis.

Conquer all in tactical, turn-based battles set on a hexagonal grid. Lead a team of cartoon heroes - the brave bean explorer, the fluffy cat defender, and the onion musician from distant realms - through a series of adventures in Whimsical Heroes!

Core Features


  • Diverse tactical turn-based combat - Engage in a variety of battles with a wide range of characters, bosses, traps, special objects, reinforcement, and events at crucial moments in battle that make each encounter unique.
  • Lead a team of Whimsical Heroes - Each hero possesses a unique set of skills and roles within the team, offering exciting tactical possibilities.
  • Meet allies and new companions - Companions will join your Camp, allowing you to expand it with new structures and providing powerful skills in next battles.
  • Manage your camp: Your Camp is a safe haven for your heroes, where you can develop both your heroes and companions and purchase new artifacts for them.
  • Influence the fate of your expedition - The world of Whimsical Heroes isn't just about battles. It also features special events that require decision-making, sometimes leading to the discovery of new secret places.
  • Unique artistic style - Immerse yourself in a world filled with cats, cheeky cucumbers, talented onions, and various other whimsical creatures. Explore what the world of Whimsical Heroes has to offer!

Story and Roguelike Modes


  • Story Mode: - Dive into the game's narrative, allowing you to explore the game mechanics and learn about the fates of the main characters and the entire land.
  • Adventure Mode (Inspired by Roguelike systems) - Choose three heroes and travel through a land that looks different with each playthrough. Heroes will acquire new skills and encounter various characters, offering fresh challenges every time you play.
